title: Los.Secretos.de.Jaime.Maussan.DvDRip

"Secrets of Jaime Maussan"

Language: Spanish [No Subs]

ddl ~ nice0 dot wordpress dot com

Jaime Maussan is a veritable celebrity in the arena of UFO research and documentation. He is one of the most prolific documentaries in the scene, and has been called the "Dan Rather of Mexico." He is internationally known for his investigations in the UFO field, and is a prestigious journalist in Mexico. In 1991, Maussan became interested in the wave of UFO sightings Mexico experienced after that year's solar eclipse. Since then, he has become Mexico's most popular UFO investigator, due in part to his weekly television program Third Millennium. Maussan is a frequent guest at various UFO conferences including the International UFO Congress in Nevada, the Worldwide UFO Congress in Acapulco, and more. Over the years, Jaime Maussan has compiled over 5,000 videos and photos, and has presented this information around the world. He has had a twenty-five-year career in the media, during which he has received numerous awards, and is now director of 60 Minutos in Mexico. He also produces a radio program on UFOs that is one of the most popular shows in Mexico. Jaime Maussan has been featured by the History Channel, Discovery Channel, National Geographic, Univision, and Telemundo.
